EmailTemplate.subject: We are bringing RIMOWA closer to home
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr, Mrs {!Contact.LastName},
We are bringing RIMOWA closer to home.
I would like to introduce myself as your personal local client advisor, on behalf of {!Account.ClientAdvisor__pc} {!Account.MainStore__pc}.
Your RIMOWA **MODEL** has now been a companion for a while now and we hope it has been trustworthy throughout your travels.
As a token of our appreciation for your loyalty and to help prepare for your future journeys, I would love to welcome you to our {!Account.Local_Main_Store__c} for a complimentary **check-up of your suitcase / hot-stamping of your luggage tag **.
Should you be interested, I would be happy to organise your visit in-store.
Kind regards,
{!User.Name} RIMOWA {!User.Base_Store_Code__c} Tel:{!User.Mobile} RIMOWA.com
